name: De é la Glenn
description:
You play as "Thin Glenn", a worker in the harbors of Gothenburg in the early 20th century. Your job is to transfer fish from the front of the ship to the back of the ship, while your boss "Fat Glenn" is telling "Gothenburg jokes". As was quite usual for this time period, your boss gets way more pay than you for your labor, and grows bigger and bigger for every swedish crown you earn him.

Controls

Actions:Controller:Keyboard:MoveLeft stickWASD
Pick up/Deliver fish"South Button"EPauseStart buttonEscape
